ELEMENT.TITLE: Picture, price, retail and you save, but customer sort/items per page settings (experimental)
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: A search results layout which displays 2 items per row with extended pricing information. This layout also features a user-defined sorting and items per page feature which is currently experimental.

ELEMENT.HTML:
Instructions for use on this custom template:
  • The search results will default to 24 items per page. The customer can set to 12,24,50 or 100.
  • Default sort order is set to alphabetical. Customer can set to alphabetical, price or manufacturer. Reverse sorting is also an option
  • Layout is experimental.

<%
